meanings.definition: A person who maliciously sets fires.
meanings.sent1: The firefighters worked hard to catch the incendiaries responsible for the forest blaze.
meanings.sent2: The police arrested the incendiaries who were causing chaos in the city.
meanings.sent3: The incendiaries thought they could outsmart the authorities, but they were wrong.
meanings.sent4: The incendiaries in the neighborhood were like trouble magnets, always causing trouble.
meanings.sent5: The news of the captured incendiaries spread quickly, bringing relief to the community.

meanings.definition: A substance or weapon used to start fires.
meanings.sent1: The arsonist used various incendiaries to ignite the building.
meanings.sent2: Firefighters are trained to handle different types of incendiaries safely.
meanings.sent3: The incendiaries in the movie were so unrealistic, they made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The incendiaries of war can leave behind devastating consequences.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the incendiaries lingered in the air long after the fire was extinguished.
